data.title: Frinton 45 - Frinton Bed and Breakfast
data.meta_description: Frinton 45 is a high quality Bed and Breakfast located in Frinton on Sea, offering a beautiful and comfortable room just steps from the award winning seafront.
data.text:
This includes a king size bed with quality linen, private ensuite luxury bathroom, nespresso machine in room and breakfast included depending on your preferences.

Both of us, and Teddy too (our small hypoallergenic poodle), are excited to welcome you to our family!

Frinton on Sea has so much to offer – lazy beach days, coastal walks and a variety of independent shops and eateries on Connaught Avenue.

Check in time is typically from 3pm on the first day of your booking, with check out time 11am on your final day. Both times can be flexible to suit your requirements depending on circumstances and availability. In certain cases it’s also possible to book the entire B&B for your stay. Please contact us for further details.
